alert.note: Alert for Central Greenville; Greater Pickens; Greenville Mountains; Pickens Mountains (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 07 at 2:25PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Greenville and Pickens Counties through 300 PM EDT... At 224 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles west of Pickens, or near Keowee Toxaway State Park, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Pickens, Easley, Lake Keowee, Jocassee Gorges, Lake Jocassee, Keowee Toxaway State Park, Table Rock State Park, Six Mile, Berea and Pumpkintown. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central Greenville; Greater Pickens; Greenville Mountains; Pickens Mountains
